■Pour the soft-serve ice cream
up to the top of the cup, but
don't add too much.
■As a guideline, fill the cup
to about 80%-90% (about four
and a half turns).

■If you put too much soft-serve
ice cream in the cup, there
won't be enough space for the
toppings to spread to the sides
and the top will get squished
under the lid.
